title: adidas Group - revenue from H1 2017 to H1 2019 , by region
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Halfs on X-axis for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Half 1st half 2019, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL 4011.0 among the 6 groups and in 1st half 2018, Russia/CIS had the lowest SOME LABEL 297.0.
In Half 1st half 2019, North America had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Half 1st half 2017 out of all 3 Halfs.
There is a gap of 369.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for North America in Half 1st half 2019 and 1st half 2017.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 3 different Halfs for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL in Half 1st half 2019 and Russia/CIS had the lowest SOME LABEL in Half 1st half 2018.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Halfs on X-axis for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Half 1st half 2019, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL 4011.0 among the 6 groups and in 1st half 2018, Russia/CIS had the lowest SOME LABEL 297.0.
In Half 1st half 2019, North America had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Half 1st half 2017 out of all 3 Halfs.
There is a gap of 369.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for North America in Half 1st half 2019 and 1st half 2017.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 3 different Halfs for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS that are presented on the X-axis.
In Half 1st half 2019, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL 4011.0 among the 6 groups and in 1st half 2018, Russia/CIS had the lowest SOME LABEL 297.0.
Among all the Halfs, North America had the highest SOME LABEL 2370.0 in Half 1st half 2019 and lowest value 2001.0 in Half 1st half 2017.
The maximum SOME LABEL for North America that was found in Half 1st half 2019 was 1.18 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Half 1st half 2017.
Out of all 6 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of Asia-Pacific.
Asia-Pacific had the maximum SOME LABEL out of all 6 groups in Half 1st half 2019 followed by Asia-Pacific in 1st half 2019, and the minimum SOME LABEL is found for Russia/CIS in 1st half 2018.

On average, the Half 1st half 2019 had the highest SOME LABEL for all 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. Whereas 1st half 2017 had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
